name: Project NFT Africa
description: Project NFT Africa is creating unique African heritage NFTs, every sale of an NFT empowers a student to go back to school. Nigeria alone accounts for more than 20 million out of school kids, this year, together with NGOs, we have been able to send over 500 students back to school. Help Us do more!
payDisclosure: Thank you for Supporting our project, We send out an NFT in appreciation for everyone who donates 300USD and above, send us an email with your wallet address to nftafrica@projectnftafrica.org
